title: BRIEF-Peabody Announces Termination Of Previously Announced Tender Offers
text:
BRIEF-Peabody Announces Termination Of Previously Announced Tender Offers

Stock Markets 13 minutes ago (Sep 20, 2019 15:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Peabody Announces Termination Of Previously Announced Tender Offers Sept 20 (Reuters) - Peabody Energy Corp BTU.N : * PEABODY ANNOUNCES TERMINATION OF PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED TENDER OFFERS AND CONCLUDES CURRENT REFINANCING ACTIVITIES * PEABODY ENERGY-TERMINATED PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED TENDER OFFER TO BUY ANY,ALL OF$500 MILLION OUTSTANDING PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 6% SENIOR SECURED NOTES DUE 2022 * PEABODY ENERGY-TERMINATED PREVIOUS CASH TENDER OFFER TO BUY ANY,ALL OF $500 MILLION OUTSTANDING PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 6.375% SENIOR SECURED NOTES DUE 2025

BRIEF-Peabody Announces Termination Of Previously Announced Tender Offers
description: BRIEF-Peabody Announces Termination Of Previously Announced Tender Offers
